description: This Java class handles exceptions specifically for API documentation endpoints in a Spring Boot application. It logs detailed information about exceptions occurring in API docs URL paths and returns structured error responses.

classes.name: ApiDocsExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring ControllerAdvice class that handles exceptions for API documentation endpoints, logging detailed error info and returning structured responses.

methods.name: handleApiDocsException
methods.description: Method that intercepts exceptions thrown during API documentation requests, logs detailed info, and returns a structured error response.

methods.name: isApiDocsEndpoint
methods.description: Helper method that determines if a request path targets an API documentation endpoint.

methods.name: getFullStackTrace
methods.description: Helper method to capture and truncate the full stack trace of an exception for logging.
